sentence.text: Immunohistochemistry demonstrated that the loss of CDK10 expression, which was observed in 50.8% of primary gastric cancer tissues (n=128), significantly correlated with advanced tumor stage (PAAAA0.001), frequent lymph node metastasis (PAAAA0.001), distant metastasis (P=0.013), tumor differentiation (P=0.004) and unfavorable overall survival (PAAAA0.001).
